list.description:
~K9 VIDAR FICTIONAL SIGHT~

Fictional thermal sight for the Norweigan K9 Vidar. The sight is from the same thermal device but probably installed on a drone, not the tank. Numbers and texts are purely cosmetic based on the images I found.

It is adjusted for WarThunder as always.

Leave feedback!

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

#fictional #sweden #norway #south_korea #k9 #k9_vidar #k9vidar #k9_thunder #k9thunder #vidar
a tank sight with the basic cat from Battle Cats on it. not much else to say.

turns out it's broken... i'll fix it someday

~TOR M-1 HISTORICAL SIGHT~
Works for 4k, 1440p and 1080p

Realistic sight for the Tor-M1 in the chinese tech tree, adapted for WarThunder. There's also sights for the Tor M2 since those look better in my opinion.
I used the strv 103 and strv 104 to make the sight since they have the same zoom that the tor has.
Picture 1 and 2 are Tor M2, picture three is Tor M1 (empty screen)

Leave feedback!

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=shari...

当前版本：2.29.0.72这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.


Current version: 2.29.0.72 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.c...
simple universal Tank Sight with =ID10T= squadron branding.

So now that the hungarian tanks are FINALY out, I've decided to gradually make some sights for the rest.

A historical sight for the Turán 1

(if you need some explaination for what is what see my Toldi 2 post)

#turan_i #hungary #historical

Little wolf girl will always be there with u.

Modified from Cavenub's sight.

https://live.warthunder.com/post/1032504/en/

Currently the sight color is red (unlike in the screenshot), but u can easily change it by modifying 'crosshairColor:c' in the blk file.

Universal, but I removed the distance marks so not recommended to be used without laser rangefinder. Easy to add back though.

#sight #crosshair #anime #all_tanks #fictional #universal

~LOSAT SEMI HISTORICAL SIGHT~
Works in 4k, 1440p and 1080p
its a cctv camera..... that's why I added M2A3 sight

Almost historical sight for the Line-Of-Sight Ant-Tank Weapon (LOSAT). Tried to make it as realistic as possible but adjusted it for WarThunder. Please message me or leave a comment if you find a better picture/video of the sight.
I know it is a Sofradir 480 x 4 infrared FPA thermal device but I couldn't find a better picture than this.

The fire control system for the LOSAT is based on the Improved Bradley Acquisition Subsystem (IBAS) that is pre...

~HISTORICAL SIGHT FOR IKV 91 AND IKV 91-105~

Very simple sight with almost no detail. Laser rangefinder is recommended!

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

~PACK OF HISTORICAL SIGHTS FOR ITO 90M, ASRAD-R AND LVRBV 701~
Works in 4k, 1440p and 1080p

Adjusted them for WarThunder.

LVRBV 701 might use the wrong sight, it is used by the same missile but on a newer launch platform.

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

UPDATE V1.2

  • Remade ITO 90M sight from a new picture I found.
  • Updated ASRAD-R's sight.

UPDATE V1.1

  • Added a 1440p and 1080p version for the ASRAD-R and ITO 90M
    ...

This is not a historical sight. It is purely fictional (i dont know how to leak klassified dokuments)

I made this sight specifically for the K9 Vidar, for my Vidar video. But since a few people have asked for it, here it is ^-^
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jsRMM9yCqWw&t=820s&ab_channel=Ruskii9000

To make the sight green for those who are unaware, you need to make the crosshair light-up. You can find that in controls, ground vehicles, and search for "crosshair lighting".

Given the scale of the scope and the sight, I dont think it will work or look right on other tanks. If someone ...

UPDATE SOON

~HISTORICAL SIGHT~
PATRIA AMV CT-CV 105HP

Kind of historical sight based of a low quality image, adapted for WarThunder.
I made it as realistic as possible and even tried to use AI image upscaling to get a better picture.

Works for 4k, 1440p and 1080p


This is a pack of almost completely historical sights for all 9040's, the 9030FIN, the 90120 and the 90105 XC-8 (will add 9035DK soon).
The sights are adapted for WarThunder to be accurate in-game. Both the funnel sights and the mils system.

Sights for novices to easier estimating target distances.

Includes generic sights for 2x-4x / 2.5x-5x / 3.5x-7x / 4x-12x / 5x / 8x / 8x-16x optics. Please check descriptions below for details.

Btw, there are also some SPAA sights which might be helpful. Please find them in another post: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1086793/en/

---

Update on 2024.02.09
- Adjusted the green color for slightly improved readability under current game rendering
Update on 2023.12.29
1. Minor visual tweaks which I can barely remember o.0
2. Moved sights for laser rangefinder v...

THIS SIGHT IS A PART OF THIS POST: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1084296/en/

~HISTORICAL SIGHT~
Realistic sight for Lvkv 9040. I made it accurate and did the rangefinder as realistic as possible, but since the real life sight has different modes I had to come up with a solution. I really like it!

Everything is explained in the pictures!

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

~HISTORICAL SIGHT~
Works in 4k, 1440p and 1080p

This is the sight used by Stridsvagn 103 or Strv 103. I tried to make it as historical as possible but had to make a few changes for gameplay.
It is not functional as intended in real life.
This is my first sight and I only made it because no one else made one. Please leave feedback!

Picture is taken from The Tank Museum on YouTube.

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

ОЧЕНЬ СИЛЬНЫЙ прицел от СИЛЬНОГО стримера https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKJlgXG9Lc9jtr1IM97ANDA.
Прицел VERY_STRONG_V2_YELLOW_sight отлично подойдет сторонникам минимализма, которые играют на машинах с прицелами любой кратности. Отсутствует маркировка отсечек дистанции!
Файл из папки распаковать в WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks
Если ее еще нет, в корневой папке WarThunder создать папку UserSights, потом all_tanks и в нее распаковать прицел

A VERY STRONG sight from a STRONG streamer https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKJlgXG9Lc9jtr1IM97ANDA.
